meanings.definition: To break or sever ties with an organization or group.
meanings.sent1: She is disaffiliating from the club due to disagreements with its rules.
meanings.sent2: The company is disaffiliating from its partnership to pursue new opportunities.
meanings.sent3: John decided to disaffiliating from the team after they kept ignoring his ideas.
meanings.sent4: The decision to disaffiliating from the political party was a bold move.
meanings.sent5: The act of disaffiliating can sometimes lead to new and exciting paths.

meanings.definition: The act of withdrawing or dissociating from a formal relationship or connection.
meanings.sent1: Her disaffiliating from the organization was unexpected by her colleagues.
meanings.sent2: The disaffiliating of the company from the industry caused a stir.
meanings.sent3: The sudden disaffiliating of the team captain left the players in shock.
meanings.sent4: The disaffiliating of the student council from the school board was a topic of discussion.
meanings.sent5: The disaffiliating of the country from the international alliance was a significant event.
